Condition to increment: When you changed a big modification so that the grid, calculation condition you created with older version will not be compatible to the new solver.

When you changed a small modification to calculation condition and grid. When a old project file that was created for an older solver is loaded, the default values are used for the new conditions, and that will cause no problem.
When you fixed bugs or changed inner algorithm. No modification is made to the interface (i. e. grid and calculation condition) is made.
